name: Patient Conversation Media
tag_list: ehealth, ehealth3-0, health, healthcare, 1-800, internet, media, news, eappointment, 1-800-brand, communication, communications
overview:
Patient Conversation Media, Inc. (PCMi), an eHealth media company, is a mission-driven leader in facilitating patient-provider communications. PCMiâ€™s consumer centric 1-800-Brands enable health providers to effectively manage their patient conversations and maximize appointment productivity. PCMi publishes the dailyRx Information Network, which produces, aggregates and syndicates trusted health and medication news and videos.

Patient Conversation Media, Inc. (PCMi), an eHealth media corporation, creates solutions designed to enhance efficiency and effectiveness through the range of communications between patients and health care providers, with a goal of reducing health care delivery costs by 5%.

Patient Conversation’s ‘digital front-door’ solutions leverage innovative technologies to enable health providers to prescribe actionable health information to patients when and where it is most impactful. PCMi’s patient appointment management solutions streamline the process of connecting a new patients with a relevant health provider.

Innovative technologies are impacting the health care industry more than ever before. As health care IT integrates with digital publishing and mobile platforms, traditional websites are being replaced with dynamic information and communication systems.

Patient Conversation’s national network of physicians, pharmacists, and behavioral health professionals use their real-world experiences to translate health research into easy-to-understand ‘prescribable content’ empowering patients to actively participate in managing their health.

PCMi’s network of web sites and voice portals now reaches over 10 million patients each month.

milestones.description: 1-800-Therapist today announced its new leadership team and the expansion of its industry leading tele-Therapy solution suite.
milestones.source_description: 1-800-Therapist Announces New Executive Team and Tele-Therapy Offering

milestones.description: Patient Conversation Media, Inc., (PCMi) an eHealth 3.0 company, announced today it has successfully closed its initial strategic funding, securing capital and assets exceeding $1 million dollars.
milestones.source_description: Patient Conversation Media, Inc. Closes Strategic Investor Funding

milestones.description: Patient Conversation Media, Inc. announced today the acquisition of 1-800-House-Call, consumer-centric online directory listing health providers.
Patient Conversation Media, Inc. announced today the acquisition of dailyRx, an eHealth 3.0 news publisher.
milestones.source_description: Patient Conversation Media, Inc. Acquires dailyRx

milestones.description: Patient Conversation Media, Inc. announced today the acquisition of 1-800-My-Kidney, consumer-centric online directory of verified kidney specialist and dialysis centers.
Patient Conversation Media, Inc. announced today the launch of dailyRx.com, an eHealth news web site featuring peer reviewed medication, nutraceutical and conditions-based information.
milestones.source_description: Patient Conversation Media, Inc. announced today the launch of dailyRx.com

milestones.description: dailyRx announced today a content syndication agreement with HealthGuru, the leading publisher of health videos.  HealthGuruâ€™s library of 1,500 health related videos have been contextually codified for relevant publishing within dailyRx.com.

dailyRx announced today the launch of two social media channels to support their growing library of health-news content.  Being active with social media will allow dailyRx to syndicate relevant content to a larger population through different mediums.
